name: Remember Me? - NaNoRenO 2022
description:
This visual novel features a student that gets invited to an unexpected high school reunion, meeting colleagues and from their teenage times, revealing what each person has become after graduating. However, a mysterious plot envelops the reunion, requiring all the attendees to work together to find a solution.

NOTE: We did not finish the game in time, making it barely playable at deadline time, if you're interested by the plot I'd suggest you save this game page and come play later. Thanks for the patience :)
